name: Pack Yak Bandit
description:
"Pack yaks. Everything changed after we tamed those giant critters. Now we build entire towns and live our whole lives on their backs, just peacefully moving along the land. It's a good system: they keep us safe from the dangers below, we take care of them and trim their thick wool. Of course, this has made a good pair of shears more valuable than gold... So valuable in fact, that it's not uncommon for bandits to hop aboard and try to clean a whole town out... "

Made By:

Developer: Dominik Alkhovik - https://dominikalk.itch.io/
